# rosenblatt

Evaluation of neural networks created using the R package nnet

## Install

```bash
npm install rosenblatt
```

## Usage

```javascript
// iris dataset predictions, linout=false and softmax=true

var n = [4, 3, 3];
var w = [
  0.442558222914919, 2.10022864771489, 2.23573368675063, 0.217011021706292, 
  -0.746385865240631, 16.237501574711, -7.35231915240128, -39.6550412545003, 
  23.367137261562, 12.0959933215026, 2.09031961798775, 0.732287302925808, 
  9.45112011208204, 3.47187412988877, -28.7113865455258, 5.29890720801739, 
  2.26900991549321, -0.527321775178841, 4.77502921656347, 11.8773486358539, 
  23.7493404235415, -30.2503734237308, -15.5200877026677, 1.77238996927405, 
  3.48199453943633, 19.849897008999, 10.9782593232489, 5.51905185997946, 
  20.8842685255224, -17.9853358352868, -7.46019743393322, -6.96998523147064, 
  -5.13292446063638, -19.7663635630998, -16.4446218975222, -17.6183047231164, 
  -44.8940992763018, 49.5383750371739, 21.7998980223325
];

var network = new rosenblatt.Network(n, w, false, true);
var p = network.predict([
  [5, 3, 1.6, 0.2],
  [5, 2, 3.5, 1],
  [6, 3, 4.8, 1.8]
]);

console.log(p);
```

```javascript
[
  [0.9999997643608252, 2.3563917487658202e-7, 2.770550760805804e-113],
  [2.7571280582773113e-8, 0.9999999724256968, 3.022679723245865e-12],
  [3.40281375514018e-17, 0.000020985275552418204, 0.9999790147244476]
]
```
